div.data-mendix-props: "widgetTree":[{"$widgetId":"25.S.Raghavan.layoutGrid1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid1 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid container-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"25.S.Raghavan.layoutGrid1$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"25.S.Raghavan.layoutGrid1$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg-12 col-md-12 col-12","content":[{"$widgetId":"25.S.Raghavan.layoutGrid2","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"mx-name-layoutGrid2 mx-layoutgrid mx-layoutgrid-fluid","content":[{"$widgetId":"25.S.Raghavan.layoutGrid2$row0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"row","content":[{"$widgetId":"25.S.Raghavan.layoutGrid2$row0$column0","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg-9 col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"25.S.Raghavan.text1","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text1","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Mr. N S Raghavan"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h1"}},{"$widgetId":"25.S.Raghavan.text2","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text2","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"Chief Executive Officer- Eyecare"},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"h6"}},{"$widgetId":"25.S.Raghavan.text3","widget":"Text","props":{"class":"mx-name-text3","caption":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":"TextMr. N S Raghavan joined Titan during the last quarter of 2023. Prior to this, he was the country manager and director – South Asia with the eye care major, Essilor Group. Raghavan brings in close to three decades of experience in building and growing businesses in the field of consumer health care having worked for organizations like Essilor, Dabur and Johnson & Johnson. Raghavan holds an MBA in Marketing and Executive management degrees from the ESSEC and INSEAD Business Schools."},"args":{}}},"renderMode":"span"}}]}},{"$widgetId":"25.S.Raghavan.layoutGrid2$row0$column1","widget":"Div","props":{"class":"col-lg-3 col-md col","content":[{"$widgetId":"25.S.Raghavan.staticImage1","widget":"Image","props":{"class":"mx-name-staticImage1","alternativeText":{"$type":"ExpressionProperty","expression":{"expr":{"type":"literal","value":""},"args":{}}},"responsive":true,"source":{"$type":"StaticImageProperty","image":{"uri":"img/Forms$Images$N_S_Raghavan_1.jpg?638847326674334486"}},"onClick":null}}]}}]}}]}}]}}]}}]}}],"listenTargets":[]
